TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VersionUpgradeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public MustInherit Class VersionUpgradeEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class VersionUpgradeEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event of a form.

remarks.para: The VersionUpgradeEventArgs object passes state information to an event handler for the VersionUpgrade event. The VersionUpgradeEventArgs object provides properties that can be used in an event handler to determine the version numbers of the form and form template, and provide a response indicating the success or failure of the version upgrade process. The properties that it provides are available only during this event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CancelableArgs As XmlFormCancelEventArgs

Docs.summary: Gets a reference to a object.

remarks.para: Access the XmlFormCancelEventArgs object to cancel the event and specify a custom message to display.
The VersionUpgradeEventArgs.CancelableArgs.Cancel property is set to false by default.
This property can be used only during the VersionUpgrade event.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DocumentVersion As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DocumentVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the version number of the form document being upgraded.
Docs.value: The version number of the form.

remarks.para: This property can be used only during the event.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property FormTemplateVersion As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ FormTemplateVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the version number of the form template associated with the form being upgraded.
Docs.value: The version number of the form template.

remarks.para: This property can be used only during the event.
This member can be accessed only by forms running in the same domain as the currently open form, or by forms that have been granted cross-domain permissions.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.
